des: "This recipe is great for all those low-carb dieters.  I am in the first phase of a low-carb diet and was really missing my Frappucino's.  This is an excellent substitute."
ins: Pour coffee into the container of a blender, and add ricotta cheese, sweetener, coffee creamer, vanilla and cocoa. Place ice cubes on the top. Blend until smooth, and pour into glasses.
